pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayes Factors for Informative Hypotheses // Computes approximated adjusted fractional Bayes factors for equality, inequality, and about equality constrained hypotheses. S3 methods are available for specific types of lm() models, namely ANOVA, ANCOVA, and multiple regression, and for the t_test(). The statistical underpinnings are described in Hoijtink, Mulder, van Lissa, and Gu, (2018) doi:10.31234/osf.io/v3shc, Gu, Mulder, and Hoijtink, (2018) doi:10.1111/bmsp.12110, Hoijtink, Gu, and Mulder, (2018) doi:10.1111/bmsp.12145, and Hoijtink, Gu, Mulder, and Rosseel, (2018) doi:10.1037/met0000187.
